articles.title: XRP Rallies Amid Singapore License Approval, SEC Appeals Rejection - Decrypt
articles.description: The native token for the Ripple protocol is leading the daily gains amidst positive news for the fintech company.
articles.content:
XRP, the native token of the Ripple protocol, is up nearly 4% over the past 24 hours, trading at $0.528 at the time of writing.
